effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The conduit or one ally within distance regains Stamina equal to half the damage dealt.
Two additional allies within distance regain the same amount of Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target has a double edge on their next strike, and that strike deals an extra 10 holy damage. Additionally, they can vertical slide each creature targeted by the strike up to 2 squares.
Damage dealt to any ally adjacent to the conduit is halved.
At the start of an encounter, the conduit chooses one creature within their line of effect. Both the conduit and the creature can add a d3 roll to power rolls they make against each other.
